title: The devil is in the details: Experiment reveals how a forest‐dwelling scavenger, and their excrement, may buffer ecosystem processes from climate change
content: This article is an Invited Commentary on Stephenson et al. (2024). This commentary attempts to provide broader context of the research within the body of literature on species loss and ecosystem functioning and highlights its relevance to conservation and global change.
author: Thomas D. Stokely
